text: Had car problems in the middle of the night, got help and he even gave me tools so I could fix it again if it happened again and it saved me big time.

name: Larry Townsend (Bill)
text: Good service

name: Andreanna Davis
text: They are absolutely wonderful! I took in my Dad’s 1993 Ford Lightning. We had been having trouble with it going dead and just not running right. Several other local mechanics had tried to fix it with little success. I read about Hesco and decided to give them a try. I’m so glad I did. They got Dad’s truck running perfectly! I will never let anyone else work on it again. They do a great job and great work! I just can’t thank them enough for all they did. Would recommend them highly to anyone.

name: Rick Clark
text: I bought a lotus and it was delivered with a flat tire.  Jeff came out to my house picked up the tire and brought it back the next day to put the tire on and check the pressure in the rest of the tires. He was happy to answer any question I had!  Amazing customer service!  A+!  I will be using them for the service of my car.

name: jeffrey vaughn
text: I grew up next door to Jeff. I remember a day when I looked out and saw a 2nd gen camaro with a blower sitting a foot out of the hood. It was Jeff. I was a kid and did the burnout hand signal..to which he happily obliged. Worked with his lil sis many years later and he still remembered. Genuinely thoughtful and kind dude who exudes knowledge.

name: Bailey Ike
text: The customer service is outstanding, the people working there feel authentic and give the impression they truly care.

name: Radioman
text:
Jeff @ HESCO is unparalleled in his infinite wisdom behind the wheel and under the hood of a car. He has been known to pull a rabbit out of a hat on many occasions. I would not hesitate to take any of my vehicles to him for any reason.
Thanks, Jeff-
Tim @ Rickwood Radio Service

name: Eric Morin
text: At last found a shop to work on my Mazda RX-8 R3 with a twin rotary. Honest diagnosis and job well done. Think it runs better than when I bought it! Thank you Jeff and crew!

resp.text: Thank you for the outstanding feedback, Eric! We are so glad that you were able to find a shop that fit your auto needs, we look forward to working with you and your RX-8 again!

name: Charles B Ireland
text: I have been taking my machine work to Hesco for many years. Best machine shop anywhere. Now that I no longer work on my own vehicles, I intend to entrust them with their care.

resp.text: Charles, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. It is a pleasure to work see you in our machine shop. We are so glad we have gained your long term trust! Let us know if there is anything we can assist you with!

name: Nichole Posten
text: As someone indicated, they do a lot of specialty high end vehicle work but it has been well worth the extra to know that the work is done right.  I have been taking my now 10yr old (beater) Jeep here for 8+ years and will take my new Subaru here.  Joe is great and always has the time to spend explaining anything to you.  He even took my husband and son around the shops to look at all of the cars there.

resp.text: Thank you for your loyalty over the years Nichole, we truly appreciate it!

name: Stephen Wilson
text: These guys do some of the best work in Birmingham. That being said, when you see the Ferraris and classic cars in the parking lot you know you are going to pay a price that matches their level of quality work. Don't let the abrasive or lack of communication keep you from at least getting a written quote from their shop. On a side note, get someone to show you around their facility because it is basically an ever changing museum of mechanical genius. Custom builds, daily drivers, etc it's a pretty cool spot in the heart of downtown. If all else fails, you can walk to Good People Brewery or Regions Park  and drink away your sorrows.

resp.text: Thank you for the good review, Stephen! We appreciate getting your feedback and we hope next time we can deliver a 5-star experience!

name: Lindsay Hobbs
text:
I have nothing but good things to say about Hesco and the people working there! My husband and I were driving from Utah to Atlanta when our car broke down in Birmingham. Even though they were busy, they fit us in and got us back on the road the next day! Not only did they fix our car, but they went above and beyond to make sure that we were taken care of while we were stuck in the city. They even called us a few days later to make sure we had made it to our destination safely and without any problems!
We are SO grateful for Jeff, Joe, and everyone else who took such good care of us! This was by far the best experience we have ever had with a mechanic, and would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review, Lindsay! We are glad you arrived safely, and we can't thank you enough for all the kind words. Our goal is to provide our customers with an unbeatable experience every time!

name: Prentice Jones
text: One of my best friends works at this shop so I know they are an A+ shop because Warren is a very good tech.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! We are so glad to have Warren on our team! We appreciate the great recommendation!

name: Jacob Hobbs
text: These are the kind of guys that would take their shirts off their backs to help you. Highly recommend to anyone who appreciates honest and high quality work!

resp.text: We appreciate the great review, Jacob. That is exactly who we strive to be. Thank you for your business, and we hope to see you again!

name: James Gavin
text: On a recent trip from Birmingham back to Atlanta my 2012 Hyundai Equus ran hot about 30 miles outside of Birmingham, we got off at exit 147 wound up having to get it towed back to Birmingham. I didn't know a mechanic in B'ham so I had it delivered to J.B. a Buick dealership, they inspected it for $309 and said that I at the least had a blown head gasket caused by a bad water pump and that it was going to cost me $2215  for them to break down the engine and make sure that there was no further damage with the engine,  and that it could be as much as $4500 to replace all the gaskets through out the engine. NOT TODAY!!! So I did a Google search and came across HESCO, the reviews were great, I spoke with Joe Molina and he arranged to have it tower to HESCO "DESPITE being in the middle of changing locations", they got it in checked it out, started it up, "No white smoke from the tail pipe", turned out to be the water pump, THAT's ALL. I can't recommend Joe Molina and the guys at HESCO Automotive highly enough, they are highly professional, extremely efficient, keep you informed at every juncture of the process, and very reasonable. I am telling ALL my friends and family to take their vehicles to HESCO Automotive. Thanks guys, this was a very stressful situation as I was having to take care of it from Atlanta, Joe you could not have been better.

resp.text: Thank you James! It is great to hear from you and glad we could help you out.  We want to make sure all of our costumes are taken care of and are aware of the repairs needed for their vehicle. We are glad you found us and we could located the problem to your water pump. We truly appreciate your recommendation. Give us a call if you have questions or need anything in the future!

name: Ron Denney
text: I had a bolt sheared off inside my BMW motorcycle wheel. I called Wesco from Hoover and explained the situation and that I lived 90 miles south in Dadeville, AL. I spoke with Joe on the phone. He said bring it in and they would see what they could do for me. They used an easy out to remove the bolt for me quickly and wouldn't even take any money for this service. Great people at WESCO!

resp.text: We really appreciate the excellent review, Ron. We are happy to help. Let us know if there is anything else we can help you with!

name: Ray Clark
text: I have a Z-3 and a 535i and would not let anyone else touch them in Birmingham.  I used to go to Tom Williams for items under warranty and they always found something to fix that did not need fixing.  Anything Joe, Jeff and his folks say, I trust completely.

resp.text: Ray - We cannot thank you enough for your business and the great review! We appreciate being able to work with you.

name: Dawn Brook
text: I took my wife's 07 Murano in for a few repairs and got the same great service as all the exotics Hesco works on. Great guys and service.

resp.text: Roy - Thank you for the great review! It is always a pleasure to be able to work with you and we cannot thank you enough for your business.

name: Katie munkus
text: I was very disappointed with this business. I had to have my car towed here the Wednesday before Thanksgiving. I was told that I would get a detailed estimate the following Monday. I was fine with that. When I called Monday I was told that they had already started replacing and fixing the damaged parts to my car without my permission and without my knowledge. So I specifically said please stop working on it until I get the detailed estimate I was promised and had looked it over. The next day I decided to have my car towed to a different shop that specializes in Volkswagen and Audi cars. When I called Hesco to tell them what I had decided they informed me that my car was almost completely finished. The owner made a decision without my permission yet again and without calling to inform me what was going on. I was highly disappointed that every decision made about my car was made without my input or knowledge. And that my request for them to stop the repairs was completely ignored. This business is very unprofessional and lacks the ability to communicate with their customers. I also feel that I was taken advantage of because I am a woman. Not to mention the repairs done to my car were done wrong. I ended up having to have all the transmission fluid drained and replaced bc they used a brand that is not recommended for German cars. I also had to have the tires rebalanced and aligned bc Hesco didn't properly do that either. I do not recommend this business to anyone.

name: Douglas Smith
text: Apparently Jim Burke Subaru won't work on modified Subaru's (so basically every WRX)... Hesco came through and even purchased the updated software so that they could diagnose my car. Skip Jim Burke and take your modified Subie here.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback Douglas, we are glad we were able to help when others fell short.

name: T Adams
text: These guys are truly great!

resp.text: Thank you, Rai for the 5-stars and kind words! We greatly appreciate it.

name: John Waldo
text: Don't take your Eaton supercharged vehicle here.

name: James C Gibson
text: Perfect service dept, on time with repairs, under quoted amount,  very pleased highly recommend,  they are a little short staffed in tech area, so big repairs take longer but every dealer is having this problem

name: Alex Lee
text: Understaffed for the services they advertise

name: Leigh Wright
text: Service department is professional, courteous and friendly

name: Jennifer Eastep (Texas Girl N Bama)
text: Very professional and friendly staff

name: André Garcia
text:
It's ok for the price.  However the reason they don't get the extra 3 stars is because they are always trying to sell you stuff you don't need, which is why I stooped coming back to this place before. Decided to give it a try and it was the same think.

The service guy called me in the garage to show me "something on my car".  He had the air filter open and he pointed to it and pointed to my EXHAUST MANIFOLD and told me that my injectors and inside "there" was full of  "gunk" and that I needed a fuel injector cleaning for $59.   FIRST, the fuel injectors are NOT inside the EXHAUST MANIFOLD or the air filter.  Second, unless you took apart my valve cover you HAVE NO IDEA how clean/dirty my injectors are.  My car is fairly new which quite low mileage and very well maintained,  don't try to scam me into something that I DON'T need,  or even if I did you wouldn't know simply by pointing to my Exhaust Manifold.

There is a good reason the place across the street "Firestone" was packed with people and they are more expansive and this place was empty.  It's called HONESTY.

resp.text:
Dear André,
We are sorry your last visit to our auto shop did not meet your expectations. Our staff is well trained to identify maintenance issues on each vehicle we diagnose. We are a family owned honest, friendly, and affordable auto maintenance shop. We'd greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns further, in hopes of reaching a positive resolution. Please contact one of the owners at your earliest convenience, in hopes of making this right with you. Thank you!
~ Jamie and Rick Martin, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham
(205) 637-5523

name: Jade Howlet
text: I never had an experience so BAD! I get my tires rotated and oil changed. I come back to get the same services done. The mechanic tells me whoever rotated my tires last stripped my lug nut post. When they realize they were the ones who did it they tell me I need to sign a waiver for them to try to fix it or pay for a whole new post! I will never be back!

resp.text:
Dear Jade,
We really appreciate our customers and continuously strive to provide excellent customer service. Our records do not show you as a client of ours. Is there a possibility the transaction is under a different name? We are happy to discuss any issues you might have with your vehicle and try to reach a reasonable solution.
Please give us a call at (205) 637-5523 at your earliest convenience. Thank you!
~ Jamie and Rick Martin, Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Trent Daniels
text: Front desk lady was very nice. The gentleman working on my truck was very informative. I always come here for an oil change, doesnt take long at all. You cant beat these prices

resp.text:
Dear Trent,
We wanted to say a big "thanks" for your nice review. We will certainly pass along the compliments to our staff. We enjoy taking great care of our customers by delivering affordable pricing and efficient services. Customers like you make our jobs rewarding and enjoyable. Thank you!
~Rick and Jamie Martin, Owners of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Justin McClew
text: Nice people that don't do nice work. Took it for the premium oil change. Told me all the belts and hoses looked good, air filter was good everything is topped off, but my radiator was leaking. Soon as I left there was a big vibration in it... Let the car sit for 3days, both radiator hoses needed to be replaced, leaking because of corrosion, the air filter was horrible, the pcv valve was clogged, power steering that doesn't leak was empty and the vibration was because they put 2 quarts more oil than the engine was supposed to have!! Quoted me a price to get a radiator when it was a hose they told me was good!

name: monica mitchell
text: I am sitting here now for the third time since a tune up and oil change last week. As soon as I drive off I noticed my car was missing in a cylinder. Had to come back and get a coil replaced immediately. Also my power steering fluid was extremely low and my coolant level was low. once again drove off and noticed oil burning. I couldn't come right back but came back a few days later and it was the plug gasket. So either it wasn't checked when the oil was drained or the tightest plug too tight. Once again even left after gasket replace and car is still burning oil. Now it smokes too. Telling me it's the axle boot which is messed up but none of this began until immediately after I've left from getting service done here. I'm so disappointed because the last time I was here I had such a good experience I thought I had found my new spot to get work done on my car.

resp.text:
Dear Monica,
We are very sorry you are experiencing auto issues. We have checked our records and our auto center does not show the name used on the review as a customer at our auto shop. We would like to assist you in finding a positive resolution and ask that you give one of us a call at the number shown below. We are happy to talk with you at your earliest convenience. Thanks so much!
~Rick and Jamie Martin, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

(205) 637-5523

name: Kristyn Taylor
text: I drive all the way from Southside to bring my car here. They are faster than that express place, at half the price but with better service.  The last time I was there, the tech noticed how terrible my headlights were and let me know they were running a special to fix them for just $20. Now I don't have to drive with my brights on!

name: Mrs. Williams
text: DO NOT TAKE YOUR CAR HERE!!! I REPEAT!! SAVE YOUR CAR AND MONEY AND GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!! My husband took his Classic Car here for an detailed  job , after picking up the vehicle the following Monday it would not crank. Upon returning my husband was told that they will not be able to work on his car after receiving the money to fix the issue.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Williams,
We are saddened to read this review. Our staff has tried to work with your husband and his classic car in a patient, honest, and friendly manner. We feel like we have done everything we could to assist you and wish you all the best.
~Jamie and Rick Martin, Owners of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Jeremy Hinton
text: They corrected several issues that left my car unsafe. They were fast, courteous and did a great job. I'll be recommending them to friends!

resp.text:
Dear Jeremy,
Thanks so much for posting the 5-star review of our auto services. It is so nice to read that you received fast and courteous auto repair services during your recent visit to our shop. The recommendations are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again. All the best!
~Rick and Jamie Martin, Owners of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Drew Cottrell
text: Ive heard this location has been shut down but ive been here recently, great service

resp.text:
Hello Drew,
Your patronage at our auto center is greatly appreciated. Thanks for the compliment on our auto services.

You are correct, we have closed this location and plan to relocate about 25 miles away close to Finley Avenue and Farmers Market. We also have a Precision Tune Auto Care center in Alabaster, which is only 6 miles away from our old Pelham shop.

We hope to see you again so we can continue providing you with excellent auto maintenance services. Thank you!
~ Jamie, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care

name: D F
text: They test the cars they service by flying up and down hilltop business dr as fast as they can.

resp.text:
Dear Drew,
Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We too have noticed that there seems to be a lot of vehicles driving faster than they should on Hilltop Drive. Please know that we have addressed this concern with  our employees and have emphasized how important it is to follow the speed limit at all times. Safety is our number one concern in our shop, and also as we test drive any vehicles. If you have any additional questions, or concerns, please feel free to call the store manager, Kevin Gainey, at (205) 637-5523. Thank you very much!

name: Amy Lynn Butler
text: I WAS a long time client until this weekend when they over charged us (found out too late after spending over $650!!) & my husband gave them instructions to leave our car locked outside of their shop, for us to pick up, since we couldn't come until after they were closed. Not only was our car not outside for us, it was still on the rack with the hood up in the shop!! We had to back track to our house & my husband was late for his job! We are VERY disappointed. We have literally spent thousands there through the years. And we are done.

name: Jennifer Cargile
text:
My husband went in with his CRV on a Saturday about 9am for a normal oil change and a check engine light, was told that he needed some spark plugs and new oil pan gasket (there were NO oil leaks that we had noticed, and we were told it was loosing 80% of its oil) and was told it wouldn't take long at all, maybe an hour,  well he didn't leave until after 12 (receipt said 1217). He asked multiple times if it was ready, was told only 20 more mins, then 30...well 2 hours after the said time he left. We had plans at 11am, so those didn't happen WHICH could have been planned for-like loading up my kids (one being a newborn) in the car and picking him up. No apologies for the extra wait time and never honest about how long it was going to take.
Come that following week, SURPRISE, there was an oil leak on the garage floor AND the check engine light was back on. So we took it back once again. He was told that it was just old oil coming out and it was fine and that some other piece needed to be replaced for the check engine light. Like why wasn't this fixed the first time!? Unless we got super unlucky and something went wrong within the 3/4 day time.

Well now it's about 4 months later and there's still oil spots on the floor!
So we called today, I got a so-so person on the phone and was told to bring it back in, no "oh my goodness! That's not what we like to hear..please bring it back in!" It was just "bring it back".

1st, can we make the comparison on the comment from Ashton Morgan below?? This was the SAME day, the SAME time and my husband remembers talking and waiting with Ashton.
We aren't very knowledgable on car repairs and we should've gotten a 2nd opinion(the Garage in Pelham is literally walking distance and everyone always has great things to say about them, but this was just for a cheap oil change-never again!) ..but we just had a baby and didn't have much spare time or sleep to decide these things with a clear mind.

I just reccomend going somewhere else for piece of mind EVEN for an oil change, even if this was just a random bad day (which look at the rating-use your brains people! We didn't and now we're paying for it with our time and now a nasty driveway and garage floor) for the people working on cars, there has yet to be a verbal apology-and now if we get one it will just seem forced.

resp.text:
Dear Jennifer,
My name is Rick and I am the owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham. We wanted to apologize for the long wait during your last visit with us. We know our customers time is valuable and we always strive to provide a reasonable time estimate on each service we perform. I can assure you we addressed the waiting issue and are thrilled to have a new store manager.

Our records show we serviced your vehicle in early February 2016. We offer a 12-month warranty on all services and encourage you to contact us at (205) 637-5523 to set up a follow-up appointment. Since your vehicle has over 189,000 miles on it, there may be another leak requiring some attention. We look forward to making this right with you. Thank you!

name: Michelle Thompson
text: Quick oil change! Very nice staff!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our auto shop for your recent oil change, Ms. Thompson. We love our customers and appreciate your business very much. We look forward to seeing you again for any of your other car care needs.  ~ Jamie, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Jarrard Blanco
text: Very prompt service and a knowledgeable, courteous staff.

resp.text:
Dear Jarrard,
It is great to read that our staff was able to provide you with prompt and knowledgeable auto repair services, topped off with great customer service. We look forward to your next visit. Thank you for your business!
~Rick and Jamie Martin, Owners of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Michael Johnson
text: My wife took her SUV here last week for oil change and now I have oil puddles all over my driveway!!!!!

resp.text:
Dear Michael,

We apologize for your mishap regarding your recent visit to Precision Tune Auto Care, Hilltop.  It is our goal to make sure each person has a positive experience with us.  It's customers like you that help us to make adjustments in our shops, to better serve you and other customers.  This has been pointed out to the employees so this doesn't happen again.  We are sorry for what happened and we thank you for your feedback.

Sincerely,
Rick Martin
205-637-5523

name: Osman Miranda
text: Is a pretty nice place!!

name: Christine Norris
text: So friendly and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review of our auto center, Christine! Your business is appreciated and we are always glad to provide you with friendly and helpful auto services. All the best to you!  ~ Jamie, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Shawn Castaneda
text: Since I've moved here this has been my only go to for brakes and oil changes. They also sell tires. Everyone here is so nice, knowledgeable and the prices are very reasonable. Highly recommend.

name: Cody Hall
text: Best Service Around. The Kelly’s are great.

name: sam myrick
text:
They are very friendly, offer great customer service, they take pride in their work and serving their customers, thay are quick but not so fast to hurry you out the door they make you feel as if you are the only customer they have, they check all points of your vehicle and they clean anything they touch, the price is very fair, I pulled in about 10 minutes before closing time and asked if I was too late, the young man smiled and said no sir pull on in.
I could go on and on.
I have been there 3 or 4 times and the service has not wavered at all
P.S. I actually passed up on free oil changes from the dealership because of the service from here!
Thank you guys

text: Great family orientated business .. Would highly recommend them for any service . My company even uses them.

text: Great service, polite and quick!

name: Lorraine Price
text: I had my oil changed this morning. As soon as I pulled into the parking lot, someone was there to greet me and asked what they could help me with. I asked how much the oil change would be. He said it was according to how many quarts of oil my car would hold, then he scanned the code of my car through the window and confirmed what the price would be. There was a waiting area just inside the door where it was air-conditioned. All of the men were extremely pleasant and kind. Another customer explained to me that they check all your fluids while you are waiting. To my surprise, before I left, even the air in my tires was checked and filled. I will definitely be returning the next time that my car needs to be serviced.

name: Jenny Limbaugh
text: Friendly, fast, professional service.

name: Francisco godinez
text: Definitely great. I have been getting my oil change every single time in here and I will continue coming back. Amazing people. Great prices.

name: zane turner
text: As soon as I pulled up I was greeted outside, my truck was on the lift within 2 minutes of pulling up. Great customer service with fast work followed by great prices. I Will definitely be back.

name: Brittney E
text: I took my Escalade to the service dept to get work done on it. They miss diagnosed it and I paid over $500.00 for repair. I had my truck 2 days before it started doing the same thing again. I called to let them know and got the vehicle back over to them. They had my truck a little over a week and claim it was not doing anything for them and that it was old codes showing up. Well since I have had my vehicle back it once again started doing the same thing showing up the same codes. I decided to take it to another dealership and to my surprise the codes that they told me was old was not old they just cleared them instead of fixing my truck. I'm very upset because they repeatedly lied to me over and over. I will not recommend the service dept at all. They just played around with my truck and I called to let Myla know that it was doing the same thing again and that I took it to another dealership and they showed me how codes had been cleared and showed me the history codes. She stated Christian the service manager would call me but he never did.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I am very sorry your experience wasn’t what you’d hoped. I have reached out to management to let them know about your recent experience. Someone will be in contact soon.

name: Nicholas Williams
text: I purchased a vehicle from this dealership in Jan 2021. I came from out of state to pick up the vehicle and when I arrived found out there was an issue with the vehicle. After waiting for a while we worked out  a fixed for the issues and the dealer said they would send a check to me for the repairs. It took almost two weeks for them to finally send the check to me.  Now over a month after I purchased the vehicle I get a message from my county tag office saying that the dealership didn't pay the Tag fe and I will have to come in and pay it.  If a dealer is not going to pay these fees, they need to let people know so your not waiting until the temporary tags run out.

resp.text:
Nicholas, I am very sorry to hear that we weren’t able to provide you with the best experience possible. I have passed this information on to the General Manager and he will be reaching out to you. We appreciate your feedback and can only improve because of it!

Haley H.
Marketing/PR Manager

name: Katy McGehee
text:
The service department is the best I've ever encountered. They have gone above and beyond every single time. I'm not a crying person but they've made me cry twice. The good cry. The first time: I assume they saw the toy factory and smashed snacks in the carpet or maybe it was my food covered shirt and crazy hair. Either way, they gave me a note of encouragement that every mom needs sometimes with a gift card for coffee. The second time: I requested a larger loaner vehicle which is apparently hard to come by. Along with my 3 kids, my dad is in a wheelchair and I transport him to/from dialysis and we just all wouldn't fit in the smaller one. They greeted me with a "one tough cookie" box with treats and snacks galore.

They are the nicest people and so accommodating. Add uplifting to that mix. That was this exhausted Mama's gift from heaven.

I can't say enough good things about them. I would buy every vehicle from them a thousand times over just to show my appreciation to their service department. Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Harry Stephens
text:
Joe Bullard Cadillac in Mobile, Al is an excellent new/used car dealer.  The building was clean and attractive.  The bathrooms and waiting area were clean and well lighted.  There was no pressure to make a purchase.
Our sales person (Troy Andrews) was very knowledgeable about the product and answered all of our questions.  He was well dressed and has a great personality.  Yes, I would purchase another vehicle from Joe Bullard when the time comes.

I believe that I was blessed with my sales consultant as well! Troy Andrews is that perfect person that you only hope to get whenever you drive into the parking lot of a car dealership! He did not come outside, ever, to hound me. We all hate that whenever it comes time to shop for a car- and they do NOT do that at this dealership! name: Veronica Eaton
text: I was due for an oil change for my 2012 Cadillac SRX and received a call from the dealership asking me to schedule an appt. I looked online 1st to schedule, there was an appt. available for the next day. I didn't book it, thinking that maybe the person that called would get credit for service. I called her back, and was informed that it would be a week out for the oil change, fine. I also had a secondary issue of getting an estimate for the liftgate actuator replacement. A week later, I take the car in and wait on it. When it was done, I specifically asked about the actuator and was told that the estimate was the paperwork. It wasn't. I called back today to see when I could have this repaired and  was given another appt. a week out. The moral of the story is that they listed 12 things for "recommended services"  but nothing on what I actually requested. The car could have been repaired 10 days ago if I had been given the info that I requested. Now I'm trying to see if I can get my SRX repaired at another dealership either in Pensacola or Gulf Port.

resp.text: Hi Veronica,  I am very sorry to hear about your recent experiece with us. It is our goal to provide each customer with the best service experience possible. We have passed your feedback along to our General Manager and Serivice Manager. With your feedback we can only improve our processes and provide you with the best experience possible.

name: Michelle Hartley
text: I had the best experience buying my 2018 Dodge Challenger at Joe Bullard Cadillac. It all started with the great customer service Bobbie Hebert gave to me from the time I called to inquire if the car was still available, her wonderful knowledge about the car, and how she was easily able to relate to myself and my brother during the sales process and test drive. She was just as excited for me as I was for myself buying my dream car. She even followed up with me the next business day they were open after my purchase to see if I was still enjoying my Challenger. This is the first time I have ever had a dealership follow up after a purchase. It really made the words spoken to me at dealership mean something.....they pride themselves on the experience not the sell. I have to give Bobbie and the rest of the team who helped complete this purchase for me 5 stars for a stellar experience.

name: Sherri Herrington
text: By far the absolute best experience I have ever had buying a car. If you are looking for a car please see Michael Sewell. Absolutely fantastic to deal with and I would highly recommend him! The transparency and honesty were a complete change from what I expected. I have an absolute new respect for the Bullard family and their dealerships. Once you walk in there is no doubt that customer satisfaction and the customers experience is higher in the business plan than the numbers are which is not normal operating procedure in most dealerships I could not write enough about how pleased I was with the whole experience. I did not walk out feeling as though a great deal on a vehicle was the only thing I got. I walked out of that dealership with an uplifted spirit and felt through the whole process that I was receiving amazing fellowship and as if I were being edified through this whole process. If God sees fit I will absolutely be a customer for life.They were an absolute inspiration and are a perfect model of a working business  plan that is extremely successful. And I’m not talking only monetarily successful. I left with a fire in me that they helped to burn brighter. And I thank them from the bottom of my heart for allowing God to work through them as they unknowingly ministered to me They never realized it and that’s what makes them special.

name: Douglas Allen
text: What started off as a beautiful experience has turned out to be a nightmare. I purchased what was told to me to be my Certified 2015 Chevrolet Suburban LTZ. Rodney Lofton who is a awesome salesman and Roseevelt Harris the phenomenal finance guy sold me the vehicle and 3mths into my purchased I was told I had over $2k worth of repairs including brakes, new radiator, tune-up, oil cooler lines, and left tie rod end just to name a few. When I asked why wasn't these things serviced and replaced before I purchased the vehicle I was told the repairs wasn't necessary at the time. I feel the salesman did a great job but the service department made it a bad purchase by not doing their job!! I had to pay for the replacement of the radiator and oil cooling lines but the other repairs are still needed. I feel robbed and will probably never purchase from a major dealership like Joe Bullard again!!

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Allen,

Thank you for taking the time to give us this feedback. To make sure this issue is addressed/resolved I have notified the General Manager, Jason Colbert, of the situation and asked that he reached out to you as soon as possible today.

I'm very sorry that your service experience did not mirror your sales experience at our store but I'm confident if there's a way to rectify the issue our team will do so.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M., Marketing Manager

name: Robert Werning
text:
Review of Joe Bullard dealership

My used car purchase was probably a little different than most.  In my case, I needed a good, reliable vehicle as quickly as possible and would immediately be making a 12 hour road trip to a different state as soon as the car was in my possession!  My salesman Curtis Williams showed me what I wanted to see, took the time to answer my questions, and gave me the time to decide if the car was right for me - no "pressure to buy" involved.

Curtis actually delivered the car personally the next day, so that I did not have make another 2 hour trip from Pensacola to Mobile and back to pick up the car!
Overall I would say that I am very satisfied with the service I received at this dealership.  If all their employees are as conscientious as the ones that I dealt with I would not hesitate to recommend this dealer.

name: Katherine Goree
text: Allen, my salesman was excellent. He treated me like we were best friends. Very polite and considerate and professional. He went way out of his way, even offered to deliver the car and paperwork to my office so it would not cut into my lunch time. I am 43, and I have never in my life dealt with such a wonderful member of any sales staff. He is the reason I will only purchase vehicles from this dealership. He has my business forever.

text: I purchased a Jeep Grand Cherokee back in June, I will say this is the most professional dealership I have ever dealt with.The entire staff was so friendly, helpful, and very knowledgeable about the vehicle we were looking at. name: Shirley Manning
text:
We just got our XT4 and are very satisfied with it. Our salesman. Troy was very kind to answer our questions and made sure we understood how things worked.  We were in a time crunch and he assured us that we could come by, call, email or text if we had more questions.
Respect and kindness are almost a lost value in todays society, but to us they are still important, Troy exemplifies these and more in how he serves his customers,
We were  surprised to hear Christian music playing and to hear the testimonies of several of the staff. We thank them for their standing up for the American values and showing that they are truly a family doing business in an honorable way.
Troy, we have put you and your new Bride on our pray list and thank you for not making fun of us older folks that haven't embraced " this tech -infested" world  fully yet.
We will see you this coming week with more ? and to drop off the keys.

resp.text: Hi Shirley. Thank you so much for taking the time to give us this great feedback about your sales experience with Troy! We're so happy that you love your new XT4. We really appreciate you choosing to do business with us and hope that you'll continue to let us know how we may be of service.

name: Willie Johnson
text:
I have purchase many vehicle and I must say that this was one of the most pleasant experiences I have encountered buying a vehicle.  From my internet inquiry I get a phone call from Ms. Ashley Allen, a very pleasant experience.  Ms. Allen set up an appointment for me to see the vehicle I was inquiring about with Mr. Ben Jackson.  From the moment I entered the doors I was greeted and treated as a lifelong customer.  After meeting with Mr. Jackson I was introduce to Mr. Curtis Williams who would be my salesman.

Mr. Williams and I sat down to discuss what I was looking for in the vehicle of my my choice.  Once I had selected the vehicle, Mr. Williams made the test drive a pleasant and unique experience.  After I decided that this was the vehicle that i wanted, he even saw to it that the reasonable minor imperfections that I nit-picked while looking over the vehicle were taken care of prior to my picking up the vehicle.  Negotiating the final price was even an enjoyable experience, which is rare.  I think that at the end of the day we were both happy with the price.  At no time during the experience did I feel pressured or uneasy.

I will highly recommend to anyone that is looking to purchase a new or used vehicle, visit Joe Bullock Cadillac and ask for Mr. Curtis Williams.

Willie Johnson

name: John Shearhart
text: We shopped online for a good while and Joe Bullard had the best prices for vehicles with a third row. Our salesman was Doug, and he made us feel like he wanted our business without seeming too pushy. The vehicle was sold at a good price and was in great, clean condition. Roosevelt secured fantastic financing, and took his time answering all our questions. They even let us use another  vehicle to return our rental while our vehicle was being cleaned. Overall we have no complaints and hope to do business again!

name: Matt Holloway
text: Terrible! I came in because I had a tail light out and it's one of the newer LED lights that aren't supposed to burn out. They told me to come in at 3 and I would be out by 4. At 4 they had just finished their diagnostic check and they told me it would cost $607 to replace my tail light. I told them to go ahead even though I believed it was too pricey. The rep told me the light costs $500+ and the labor wasnt that much. I started to look up the part online brand new and I could buy 2 for less than what he quoted me. I told him they could stop and I'll bring in the light myself after buying it cheaper elsewhere. He tells me I will still have to pay $135 for the diagnostic. No problem. He comes back and tells me it's already in. I ask well where is my car? He says they're finishing up. 45 minutes later he comes back and tells me that they put a new light in and it didnt work. Must be a wiring issue he said. So I said: "So that $135 diagnostic u tried to charge me for wasn't even accurate? Because the diagnostic claimed I needed a new light." He never did answer. They did change my oil so I paid for my oil change only and went to leave. When I got my car back if was filthy even though they claimed all customers get a complimentary wash with all services. I will never go there again.

resp.text:
Hi Matt,

Thank you for providing us with this valuable feedback. I assure you this is not the Bullard experience we want for our clients.

I have forwarded your comments to the Service Manager, Sean Alexander, as well as the General Manager so that this can be addressed. I’ve also asked for one of them
to contact you to personally discuss in more detail.

I’m sincerely sorry for how your visit with us needed and I hope that we will be able to earn back your business.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M.

name: Julie A
text:
Our family was on vacation in Mobile Alabama this past week. Things didn't go quite as we had planned. Our SUV was cutting out pretty bad on the highway. It was getting worse the closer we got to Mobile. I contacted my friend who's daughter lives in Mobile to see if she might know of a service place. I talked with her daughter and she informed me that her husband, Kyle, worked for Joe Bullard Cadillac. She gave me the number for the service department and said to speak with Haley.  About this time the check engine light came on in our vehicle. It was flashing on and off, then would stay lit.
When I spoke with Haley in the service department she asked about the service engine light. When I told her it had been flashing intermittently she was immediately concerned and said we should get stopped as quickly as we could to avoid internal engine damage.  She then helped us get started with finding a tow service. We were 50 miles aWay and had four people so their usual towing service couldn't do it, but she got the ball rolling for us. She gave me her direct phone number so I could call if I needed anything.
Once we got to the dealership Kyle helped us get a loaner car while ours was being repaired. Haley kept us informed as they learned what was wrong. Our technician, Mike, came in on Saturday to work on our vehicle because we needed to leave to head back to Missouri on Sunday.
To make a long story short...God used all of these people to help us during a difficult time. They made this experience so much less stressful than it could've been. THEY WENT ABOVE AND BEYOND TO HELP US! And, they did it all with a smile. We appreciate the dealership and all the individuals who helped get us back on the road. I would recommend them to anyone who needs service or a new ride!!!

resp.text:
Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We always strive to meet the needs of our customers no matter the situation. Feel free to let us know if you have any concerns about your vehicle.

Kind regards,
Robby Herbert, GM, rherbert@joebullard.com (251)-544-7341

name: Jami Morgan
text: The people in the service department handling my claim were very nice. What I didn't like was that the mechanics were excessively rough with my vehicle. I had to have it towed and the towing company left it at the gate. Christian got me a loaner car, which I appreciated very much. When I picked up the loaner there were 2 guys who were trying to get it started to get it up to the shop. I needed to grab a couple things out of my car so I stopped to do that. For some reason they needed to open the back hatch. I was traveling with my animals so I had a large kennel in the back. I watched them put my seats down (rather roughly) and sling my kennel from the back to atop the back seats. It made me cringe but at this point I needed to get going as I had some stops to make and  I thought surely they knew what they were doing, this is a Cadillac dealership afterall and these cars cost a lot. They will surely be careful... When I got my car back, instead of them putting the vehicle back they way they found it, the kennel was still strown across the back. (As a plus though, it was washed! Which I appreciated since I had been on the road and try to take care of my car!) When I went to move the kennel back in place I noticed that there are scrapes across the plastic sides in the back. Greeeeaaaaaat. But, at that point I was leaving to head back to my home state and couldn't worry about it. It was more important to get home safe. They told me in addition to the battery that I needed new air filters, a rear wiper blade, and the throttle body cleaned, all easy enough for me to do myself. So, now I am here doing said maintenance and when I popped the hood I immediately noticed that my positive battery terminal clip has been broken and won't stay shut. Great. I am now back home, 3 states away. I will be back to the area, and am considering moving my family there but if they don't make this right I will find a different dealership to maintenance at.

resp.text:
Hi Jami,

Thank you for taking the time to leave your review and detailed feedback. We are closed today; however, I’m sending your comments over to my General Manager and Service Manager to make sure they address this first thing in the morning. Please expect a call from us tomorrow. I’m very sorry for your experience and I hope we have the opportunity to prove to you this is not how do business nor is this how we want our customers to feel when they leave our dealership.

Sincerely,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

name: Bill McLarty
text: I am William, answering for my wife Cheryl.  We bought this car new in 2004.  It has been solely serviced and maintained by McConnel/Bullard.  It has less than 30,000 miles on the odometer.  It's been the worst car we've owned since our marriage in 1962.  The problem today was a broken window regulator on the rear driver's side.  My wife has been the sole driver of this car.  We have no children in then home.  My conservative guess is that this window has been lowered and raised no more than 10 times in its aborted lifetime.  My wife was told a plastic roller had broken.  A plastic roller in a $50,000 (2004) Cadillac?!  My bill:  $517.23!  I can go back through my invoices and find similar instances of shoddy work and padded bills.  During the second year we owned the car the driver side dash assembly fell off the dash while my wife was driving.  At around the 4-5 year of ownership your service supervisor convinced my wife that she needed to replace all four tires (around 10,000 miles) because they had "dry-rotted." ($800)  I've owned two Cadillac De Ville's prior to this, and have never experienced what has to be either poor construction, low-quality parts, or untruthful service managers.

The courteous and helpful efforts of management, sales staff, customer service, and the service department were outstanding, and very much appreciated.

text: Will never purchase another used vehicle that's not made by  Cadillac. My son purchased me a Lexus GX 470 after it was traded in. I had a total of six loaner cars from the date of purchase . Why ? Because of Technicians that are clueless to what they are doing. On  one occasion I was delivered by truck to the service department on a flat. Really !!! Never Ever will they get a dime or another referral from me. I wish they had a half star. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

name: barbara cowan
text: Saw a vehicle being advertised on Autotrader website that I was interested in. Before I made my visit to the lot, my mind was set that I would only be going to look at the vehicle. I was not even planning on test driving. But Mustafa Elastal (Moose) was so friendly and laid back, he made me feel very welcomed and comfortable.  All my questions and concerns was addressed with expertise and professionalism. Not once did I ever feel pressured. After a test drive and feeling this the vehicle I wanted, I told him I will be getting back with him. After conversing on and off for about a month with Moose the salesman by phone and having the privilege to speak directly to Ty (the owner of the dealership)  I felt the dealership really wanted my business and cared about my satisfaction.The deal was made by phone. Vehicle was delivered to my home personally by my salesman. All transactions and paperwork done in the comfort of my home. I was very impressed with the way I was treated during my recent buying experience at Joe Bullard Cadillac. Would definitely recommend family and friends.

name: Austin Tanner
text: Awesome job by the service team as usual.

Best regards,
Robby Herbert, GM, rherbert@joebullard.com (251)-544-7341

name: Jenny Linda
text: Bought a 2009 GMC Yukon used from this dealership. Great service, very friendly and helpful. Scott Howie was very accomodating in trying to make sure I got the truck I was looking for and was very helpful. Mr. Richard Nassar knew I was on my lunch break and worked very quickly to get me in and out and finished with all my paperwork all with a smile on his face. Went to many other dealerships in the search for this used truck and could not be more pleased with my experience here at Joe Bullard Cadillac. Will start here first next time and leave the rest for last resort!!!

name: Jeannette Bennett
text: Worst used vehicle I've ever purchased. This car has cost more in 18 months than my Honda in ten years. Inspection protocol was incomplete before the car was presented for sale. When I tried to find out what had been done I received this asinine answer: if it needed something we did it. Will never purchase a car here again.

resp.text: Jeannette, I am sorry to hear about the recent frustration with your vehicle. Our team is dedicated to providing our customers with a top-notch experience and I’m disappointed to see this wasn’t the case for you. Our GM, Marc Heiter will be reaching out to you shortly regarding this matter. Sincerely, Joe Bullard Cadillac Team

name: Johnny Swopes
text: Absolutely, the most wonderful buying experience my wife Kathy and I have ever had.  The atmosphere was amazing!!  Ty was very gracious and made us feel so welcome as did the entire Bullard family!! Andrew Speight was phenomenal with his delightful British accent describing all of the wonderful details of this truly great Cadillac DTS. His knowledge of the vehicle was paramount!! He knew 'everything' and treated us royally with the test driving and description of the many facets of the vehicle. Andrew kept everything in perspective of the price we could afford. Then he turned us over to Jon McCarthy who was equally as brilliant. Jon made it happen!!! What service!! Jon was so relatable with such tenacity in helping us, and he really came through with making our dream come true!! We highly recommend the family of Joe Bullard Cadillac, and especially Andrew Speight and Jon McCarthy.  They will indeed spoil you! We really thank the Lord for sending us to this Company, thy are a true blessing to the gulf coast!!

name: C C Hall
text: I purchased a Cadillac SRX on 1/11/14 from Joe Bullard Cadillac. Curtis, Roosevelt and Ty were very courteous to me and my husband. They answered all of my questions and worked with us to get to the price we were willing to pay. The Cadillac warranty is hard to beat, especially the 4 years of maintenance and the road side assistance. This is the 6th GM vehicle that we presently own and I know will be the best serviced one by far. I had been looking for a vehicle for 5 months when I decided to look at the SRX. I am glad I did. It has everything on it that I was looking for plus a lot or more features. Everyone at the dealership that walked by you spoke and asked you how you were doing. This is a dream vehicle for me and I look forward to driving it for years. I will recommend to family and friends that are interested in a great luxury car or SUV to get a Cadillac at Joe Bullard Cadillac in Mobile, Alabama and ask for Curtis. I had to use the service department today to get my oil changed and check the routine things out. Christian and the others were very courteous and took care of me and my SRX. The customer lounge area was very pleasant and comfortable during my wait.

name: Greg Loughlin
text: Good workmanship, poor communication.  No warranty info with tires on road hazzard option.

Hi Mr. Loughlin,

Thank you for giving us this valuable feedback. I have sent your comments to our Parts and Service Manager as well as the General Manager for them to consider how we can better improve our communication and process. Please feel free to contact us any time you need assistance and we hope to continue working with you in the future.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

name: Ashley Brown
text:
Superior Service A++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

My experience at Joe Bullard Cadillac - Mobile Alabama was excellent to say the least. The moment my fiance and I pulled up to the dealership we felt welcome. Mustafa Elastal immediately greeted us and made us feel important. He went out of his way to make us feel comfortable as he walked around the lot with us picking out suitable vehicles. This was very important to me considering I had never owned a Cadillac before. His extensive knowledge of the vehicle I wanted (XTS) and the history of Cadillac itself impressed me by far. The hospitality didn't stop with Mustafa. Roosevelt Harris also did a fine job answering all the questions I had about the different cars and prices. He also mentioned a couple of nice restaurants we could try out while visiting Atlanta, GA which we did and absolutely loved. Curtis Williams came by and personally greeted us and also had a nice conversation with my fiance. Last, but definitely not least, Jon McCartney was absolutely amazing (and not just because he actually knows where Winnfield, LA is located lol). He worked very hard to get the financing I needed to get the exact vehicle I wanted. It was a hard sale for me, but he showed us that he wouldn't give up. I really appreciated all the time that each of them took out to make our experience the best car buying experience we have had. I would recommend this dealership without thinking twice (I already have mentioned them to others), and I will be bringing others to come do business with Joe Bullard Cadillac in Mobile, AL.

name: Ramona Reed
text: Honestly we did not wake up that morning thinking of buying a car. We saw one on the interstate and decided to go look at them. When we got there it was freezing and windy and Darren Robinson was in the parking lot moving cars. He offered his help and we told him we were in town to Christmas shop not spend all day at a dealership, we just wanted to try the car on for size. he escorted us inside for coffee and cocoa and went to get the car. we test drove it. we loved it but we were not there to spend all day at the dealership. we left our personal information to be reviewed and were going to shop when Darren notified us that we would be using the cadillac for the day via loaner form approval. we really enjoyed using the car. we Christmas shopped all day and when we returned to the dealership we had been approved for the car with our payments within dollars of request. Jon McCartney had to have been the most professional financial manager i have ever encountered. He was a real person who made us feel right at home and comfortable to speak openly. very friendly and personable. then Roosevelt Harris enters the picture. a gem. a diamond in the rough. so charismatic so joyful and helpful and accomodating. I cannot put into words how much Darren helped to familiarize us with the cue and features. he was so knowledgable of the cars systems. he was an absolute treasure. I cant say but one thing about Joe Bullards team, "you are doing something right". I got hugs from everyone when i left. i felt like i was part of a family there. I even got a text message from Darren on Christmas morning wishing us a merry Christmas. i literally spent 2 hrs tops at the dealership and received the most beautiful CHristmas gift I could have ever dreamed of. but the most inportant thing was the environment and kindness that we experienced while there. oh and my son loved the lounge with computers and coffee/cocoa which made his time there enjoyable also. we will definitely reccomend Joe Bullard Cadillac to friends and family and we will definitely be repeat customers ourselves. my only hope is that we have the privilege of having the same staff in years to come. Thank you so very much.

name: Fred King
text:
From the moment I walked in the front door, Andrew, Ben, and Ty did their best to find the perfect car for us. They were more than successful, my wife and I both have never been more satisfied with a major purchase and the reason for this was the genuine effort each member of the team at Joe Bullard put forth to ensure that we left not only as satisified customers, but as new friends.

Andrew stayed with us and walked us through the process and was a very genuine and honest regarding the steps and what was happenning and what was going to happen.

Ben was very diligent and went above and beyond to get the exact car we were looking for... the car is perfect, just what we wanted.

Ty was also great, taking time to sit and talk to us about what was happenning and to ensure us that everything was on track and going well. It was and it did. I do not remember seeing as big a smile as when I told my wife that ya'll had her car ready... Thanks

Richard made the paperwork fly by with ease... the power of a sharpie to show me where to sign... Thanks for making the experience great.

I can not say enough about my outstanding visit and purchase, when you want to go back to the dealership that sold you a car to visit with  the people who were involved in getting you a vehicle because they are now friends, I guess that is how it is always suppossed to work, I am glad that I found the place to go and to send my friends and family to when we need not only a new vehicle, but to meet some outstanding people as well.

Thanks again!

Fred & Diane

name: Andrea La Rossa
text: Wow!  Another great experience with Joe Bullard Automotive!  My Salesman, Damos Brand, was wonderful. He was courteous, professional, and very knowledgeable about the Cadillac product line and that helped make my car buying experience a dream!  Damos delivered my new Cadillac XTS to me and then spent as much time as I needed going over all of the XTS functions and assisted in setting up my XTS to suit me perfectly!!  I love my new Cadillac XTS and once again, I will recommend Joe Bullard Cadillac, Damos Brand, and the New Car Sales Manager, Roosevelt Harris, Jr., to everyone I can.  Both of these men are true assets to Joe Bullard Automotive.

name: Jim Smith
text:
I was impressed from the start with Rich Borden who was the first person I met and provided me an excellent selection of new and used models to make my choice. I had driven a 2002 Cadillac Deville for 10 years, so I was already happy with the Cadillac family and had owned/driven GM (Pontiacs before the Deville)cars since 1966. Because I perferred new over used, and because I had never leased a vehicle, Rich introduced me to Ben Jackson who provided me the pros and cons of the lease vs purchase option. I made my decision on a 3 year lease. I made my choice of the 2013 XTS.
The administrative process was made flawless by the excellent knowledge and professionalism of Ben Jackson and Richard Nassar.
The entire sales staff from Ty Bullard(same as when I bought a new Olsmobile Holiday 88 from his Dad and Granddad Joe Bullard in 1978), Roosevelt Harris(who presented me my Cadillac IPad),and in particular Rich Borden was outstanding.

name: Ken Klispie
text: Excellent service! The team at Guthrie's did a thorough inspection of our new/used minivan after it started making various intermittent sounds from a long cross country drive. They were able to pinpoint several issues that were small but would have left us stranded on our next big trip. Quick, very reasonable and communicative through the repairs. We did our next long trip without any issues or noises. We know where we will be taking all of our cars for service, thank you!

resp.text: Thank you, Ken for the review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to help with your automotive needs. Welcome to Alabama!!!

name: Steven Richardson
text: We were traveling through Alabama and my pickup broke down right off the 310 Cullom exit. The tow truck driver recommended Guthrie.  We were nervous not knowing anyone but were pleasantly surprised. We received text updates and a phone call to explain what needed to be done.  They exceeded our expectation completing the job quickly and at a fair price. Highly recommend their auto shop. God Bless.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Steven. We appreciate your kind words. We always try to get people back on the road. I know what it is like to be broken down on the road. Especially if you are on a schedule. Thank you so much for choosing Guthrie's Auto Service.

name: Michael Blair
text: Our car started experiencing some pretty severe issues on our drive home to Tennessee from Florida. We genuinely could not have chosen a better exit to pull over at! We pulled Guthrie's Auto up on our Maps and decided to take our car over there. Despite how busy they were, they were very understanding that we were from out of town and immediately got to work on our vehicle and offered recommendations on places to eat around since we had to wait several hours! Absolutely awesome service!

resp.text: We appreciate your words, and the 5 stars. We strive to give everyone a 5 star experience and help them along their way. Thanks again. Terry Guthrie

resp.text: Thank you Victor, we appreciate your business. Terry

text: Great people. Keep you updated on progress and prices. Very trustworthy.

resp.text: Thank you Teresa, we appreciate your business and kind words. Terry

name: Barbara
text:
A Great Place/Great People... Our truck broke down & Triple A couldn’t have found a better place to take it to! They took us to our hotel & picked us back up....The owner went above & beyond to get our truck fixed so we could be back on the road this morning! Truck is running great again! Thank You So much for not only getting our truck fixed but for your kind & thoughtfulness.
Rick, Barbara & LACI

resp.text: It was a pleasure to meet you two. I was happy to help you all with your F-250 diesel. Glad you were able to get back on the road any get out of the flooding that we had that day. We were safe but got a lot of rain that day. Thanks again for letting us to serve you.

name: Janice McGahey
text: They got my car fixed in no time flat. The cost was super reasonable. And it’s been several weeks everything is running perfectly. I would highly recommend Terry and his crew!!

resp.text: Janice, thank you for your review! We're glad we could provide a quality auto repair service for you and we'll see you soon!

name: La Donna Griffin
text: I received very good service, both times I brought my car to Guthrie's.  Very nice employees., and patient with the questions I ask.  I'll be back.  I've recommended Guthrie's to a few people.

resp.text: Thank you La Donna for the 4 stars. We hoped to give you a 5 star experience when we serviced your Kia. Maybe next time. We do appreciate you trusting us with your vehicle. Terry Guthrie

name: Page Sparks
text: A couple years ago my car was really in a bad way, and took it to the dealership. They were going to charge me $1500 for my repair. I despaired and reached out to friends and family for recommendations. A good friend recommended Guthrie's, said they always did good work. So I called them up. For the same repair they were going to have to charge close to $900. It was better but still hurt. Took my car up and waited. Got a call from Mike and he said that he wanted to check over the car before I spent all that money. He discovered what the dealership didn't, that something was just unplugged. Only charged the diagnostic fee! He could have charged me fully, but he and this business have been ethical. I take my car to them anytime I have issues, and they've been precise and sure every time. Would highly recommend for anyone who's been burned by bad mechanics.

resp.text: Page, thank you for your review. We were happy to have been able to help you out with your vehicle and to save you money. We appreciate having you as a customer and we look forward to seeing you next time!

name: Hustle Hard Fitness
text: Very caring and reliable crew Terry and them have always took care of our car needs and always does a fantastic job! Great prices and they get it done it a timely manner

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We'll continue to provide a caring and reliable atmosphere for your auto repair needs and we look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Felicia Wright
text: Took my vehicle to have my AC looked at. They were very friendly and knowledgeable. Seemed to want to help me more than just make a dollar. They have a text system set up that notifies you when your vehicle is being worked on. The owner follows up with you a day or so after you pick up your vehicle to be sure everything is going well. Very personable business.

resp.text: Felicia, thank you for your review! We're happy to have looked at your A/C and we'll continue to be friendly and knowledgeable.

name: John Thomas
text: Broke down while traveling. They was very helpful and willing to get our truck repaired at very reasonable rates. I highly recommend Guthrie's Auto Service.

resp.text: John, thank you for your review, we hope you had safe traveling after visiting our auto repair shop, and please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Bettie Burnett
text: Had car towed to Guthrie's for repair on coolant system. Had been told by two regular customers that they do really good work. The office attendant (Mike, I think was his name), was straight-forward, respectful, patient, gave me a phone quote, had the work done timely, with the final bill ending up being a little less than the original quote, even after adding the tow bill & taxes. It was a very welcomed change from the experience I'd had at another local shop I'd been referred to (but later warned about from several other past customers) where I repeatedly had to endure rudeness from the know-it-all mechanic, immediate breakdowns from same issue I'd just paid to have repaired, & ignored voicemails asking to speak to the owner. Guthrie's owner followed-up the very next day to make sure everything was going well with the work on my car. I would much rather pay for a job well done the first time than a little less and keep breaking down, having my car towed, finding another way to work at the last minute to keep my job, and then constantly being talked down to in person & over the phone (while the owner justifies it as him "being from New York",... to which I reminded them both that he's now n ALABAMA, & that cocky attitude won't do here, especially with me!!... 3 different types of repairs... never fixed after being told they were!). So, yes, I am very happy to give Guthrie's a positive review, THANK YOU!

resp.text: Bettie, thank you for your review. We were happy to help out with your coolant system repair and we are glad to be respectful, honest, and patient for all of our customers. We are sorry you had a bad experience at a different shop, but thank you for trusting us to get the job done. See you later!

name: Randy Anderson
text: Took my '08 Tundra in for some pretty major repairs (stuck secondary air intake valve, timing belt replacement, pulley repair). I’m beyond pleased with the quality of the work, the affordable price, and the speed of service you guys gave me. I’m new to the area, and will be coming back to you guys for any vehicle work that I need, and I’ll make sure to tell everyone else I meet about you as well! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Randy! We're glad we could help you out with your '08 Tundra repairs, and we'll continue to offer quality and affordable auto repair services, and we are excited to have you as our customer. See you next time!

name: hotrodford 88
text: Great people to deal with.

name: Jeffrey Stevens
text: They were AAA approved brought truck in for water pump replacement they repaired it in a timely manner and did a over all inspection people were very friendly

resp.text: Jeffrey, thank you for your leaving us a review. We're glad to have helped you out and let us know if there anything we can do for you!

name: Cheryl Masterson
text: I was traveling thru Cullman car wouldn't start.  They repaired it same day. What a blessing, excellent service.

resp.text: Cheryl, we're so glad we could help you out while you were traveling through Cullman. Thank you for trusting us with your auto repair needs!

name: Mark Maddox
text: My truck needed help. I planned on it being in the shop for 7 to 10 days. I dropped it off on a Monday afternoon, and received a call on Friday afternoon that it was ready. Never did I think anyone could repair or replace as many things as Guthrie's did in such a short time. I left Guthrie's and drove to Gulf Shores. The true test, interstate highway's in Alabama. They did a great job. No vibration, shaking, or leaking. Awesome job guys. Thanks.

resp.text: Mark, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! Here at Guthrie's Auto Service, we understand how important your vehicle is to you. That is why we always strive to provide quality care in a timely manner. It was a pleasure to work on your truck and we're thrilled to hear that your drive to Gulf Shores was smooth. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Jason Bookout
text: We were from out of town and our car broke down late on a Friday afternoon. Terry the owner fixed our busted coolant hose and had us back on the road in less than 2 hours for a fair price. He did not take advantage of a situation where we had no other choice.  I have later heard from other friends in the area that Terry does great work. Would highly recommend if you are in the area.

resp.text: Jason, we appreciate your kind review and were happy to assist with your coolant hose. We understand how frustrating it can be to deal with vehicle issues when you are out of town, so we were glad we could fix it quickly so you can be on your way. Thank you and please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you in the future!

name: tanya roberson
text: Very courteous, professional, high quality service! They solved our overheating issue and fixed it Fast! Highly recommend!! Best auto service in Cullman!!

resp.text: Tanya, thank you for your review! We're excited to continue to be courteous, professional, and provide high quality service! Looking forward to seeing you next time!

text: Terry was very helpful and pleasant.I went there to have an stimate on a problem that I have in my SUV. The place is very clean.prices are reasonable. Thanks Terry.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your support of our auto repair shop!

name: Justin Nichols
text: Needed help tracking a power draw draining my battery, they found it and got everything sorted very quickly. I was very pleased with the service and I will absolutely use them for future repairs.

resp.text: Justin, thank you for your review! We're glad we could be here to help with your battery, and we'll look forward to seeing you next time in our auto repair shop!

name: Douglas Ballenger
text:
I was really surprised by the service and friendliness of Guthries auto service, after I spent 2 weeks working on my vehicle with no luck finding the problem I decided to find a shop to work on it. A friend of mine recommended Guthries. Some of problems I was having with my vehicle was, lost power to all of my windows, lost power to my rear view mirror and backup camera, blown bulb in taillights, short causing battery to drain, could not turn ignition switch All the way off so I couldn’t get key out 🤔😂 but the power door lock still worked!!
But don’t lock them if you have something draining your battery ! 🙃 Seriously Guthries will be my go to from now on ! Very friendly service, very knowledgeable and very fair service pricing!! I’m not going to say what my vehicle problem was ask Mike when you take your vehicle 🚗 in.

To all at Guthries auto service,

Thank you 🙏

resp.text: Douglas, we appreciate your kind review. We were more than happy to help you out of a tricky situation with your vehicle, and we'll continue to be friendly, knowledgeable, and fair-priced for your future visits. Thank you and we'll see you again!

text: Great service and repairs. Called me as they found issues and got my approval before all repairs. Even checked with me the next day to make sure everything was working. I will take my other vehicles there for any service or repairs. Very satisfied customer!

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback, Marie! Our goal is to provide quality repairs to all of our customers along with excellent communication to keep our customers in the loop. We look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Emily Taylor
text: I've used this shop for a number of repairs on my older vehicle now. Their prices are fair, the staff are all friendly and knowledgeable, and they are very expedient! I never have to wait long when I call, they're usually able to schedule my repair for the same week, and they always complete my repair in less time than expected.  They also send valuable customer loyalty coupons!

resp.text: Emily, we are glad to have you as a customer in our shop. We will continue to offer fair prices, friendly and quality service, and timely. We look forward to your next visit to our shop!

They kept me updated with the progress and about 2 days later I had my car back in perfect working ordering! I have no idea what this kind of work is worth with parts and labor but having peace of mind is worth it all.

text: I called and scheduled an appointment on a Wednesday for a that Friday.  I had never been in before as I haven’t lived in Cullman long. My car was ready before they got there. (A/C leak). Two days later I get a text from the manager following up to make sure I was satisfied and to make sure the A/C was working properly. That alone will have me going back when I need service again.

resp.text: Chris, we are glad that you had such a positive experience at our shop for your A/C leak. We do our best to be quick and thorough for our customers because you guys are our priority. Thank you for your review and we're happy that we have gained a new customer!

text: Bought a lifetime balance and rotation 56,000 miles ago.  Managed to get it done 3 times.  The last time I lost a center cap and all 4 tires had different air pressure. I had made numerous attempts to have this done and was told it would be about a 4 hour wait.  Another attempt I was told it would be about 3 hours.  Again I was told they had now idea when they could get to it.   I asked to make an appointment but was told I couldn't.   I now have a set of Michelin tires with uneven wear.  A waste of $36, a waste of a new set of Michelin tires and the toll it takes on a person who has to try to communicate with people who have no communication skills and just don't care.   Do yourself a favor and go anywhere but here.
